item.title: *MAYBE* hard to fix-FindBankSymbol color and put the object in bank
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Alright, one problem was that you had a const and were using it as if it were a variable, you cannot do that.

[code]
{ ~~~~~~~ ~~~~~ ~~~~~ ~~ ~~~ ~~~
_________~_~~~~~~~~~____~
J //jjjjjjj| ||uuuu| J ||uuuu| J||n| ||kk| //kk/
//| ||uuuu| J||uuuu| ||n| J ||kk| //kk/
||j| J||uuuu| ||uuuu| ||n|____ ||kk| J//kk/
J J ||j| ||uuuu| J ||uuuu| ||n| \\ J ||kk|//kk/ J
___ ||j| ||uuuu| ||uuuu| ||n| J ||n| ||kk|kkk|
||jjj| J ||j| ||uuuu| ||uuuu| ||n| ||n| ||kk| \kk
||jjj| ||j| ||uuuu| J ||uuuu| J||n| J ||n| J ||kk| J\kk\ J
||jjj|___||j| ||uuuu| ||uuuu| ||n| ||n| ||kk| \kk
||| J \|//// J ||| ||_| |||J \\

jjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjj
jjjjjjjjjjj
*******jjjjjjj
**********************jjjjjjjjjjjjjjjj******************************
jjjjjjjjjjjj************
jjjjjjj j*************
jjjjjj************************
jjjj************************
j***************j*********
j***************j*********
j***************j*********
j***************j*********
j*****j*********
jjjjjjjjjjjjjjj

{<^%$@$%$@%$@^#%&^%&%-!=$JUNKY PRODUCTIONS$=-!#^$&%&^$!#@$$&%^&$%$#@$#%@>}
{!READ AT OWN RISK!}
{ !NOT! !RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY BANNED ACOUNT!( OR SCAMMED ACOUNT) }
{ LAST VERSION OF AUTOTALKER }
{ !REPORT ANY BUGS OR STUFF THAT DOESNT WORK! }
{!where ever it says “ONLY CHANGE THIS” read or change what its talking about! }
{ must be at the computer when trading and banking }
{ SETUP the SETUP }
{ !!!IF COPIED,SOME OF THE CREDIT GOES TO ME, DO NOT SAY ALL TO YOU!GOSH!!! }
{ ±+SPECIAL THANKS TO±+ }
{ BULLZEYE }
{ JUNIOR }
{ AND OTHERS THAT HELPED }
{ ENJOY THE JUNKY SCRIPT IS FULLY UPDATED,LOOK BELOW FOR MORE UPDATES! }
//////////////////////////////////|||:|||\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
{VERSION 1.0—ask for it nicely (Average autotalker)
{VERSION 1.1— ask for it nicley!{trades,accepts, and logs out!!!}
{VERSION 1.2— adjustments{Goes to the bank,puts the money in and logs out!!}
{PLEASE REMEMBER BANNED ACOUNTS ARE NOT MY PROBLEM!}
{________________________________ENJOY!}
{SET UP CONST AND READ NOTES!}
{__________________________________________________}
program autotalker;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/misc/trade.scar}

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
//---------------------------------setup--------------------------------------\
const //
message1=(‘buying air runes!’); //type what you want him/her to say.} \
RandomTime=1000;//Change to set random time,EX=(1000-infinite=sec,1-999=Msec) \ //
HowMuchToTrade=1; //how many declines from the trade before it logs out \
BankSymbolColor=6021102; //put your bank symbol color here //
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
message2=(‘Thanks’); // DO NOT CHANGE THIS!!!
RandomTime2=5000;

procedure autotalk;
begin
wait(4000+random(RandomTime)) // change random time above
TypeSend(Message1 + Chr(13))
end;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
Procedure SetChats;
Begin
SetChat(‘Hide’, 1);
SetChat(‘off’, 2);
SetChat(‘on’, 3);
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
Procedure Progress;
Begin
Writeln(‘Running for ‘+(TimeRunning)+’’);
Writeln(‘Went Through ‘+(IntToStr(Trades))+’ trades!’);
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
Procedure Trading;
Var
TraderName: string;
colonx, colony :integer;
Begin
AcceptTrade;
Wait(2000+Random(2000))
If Not(TradeScreen)Then
Begin
Exit;
End Else
If(TradeScreen)Then
Begin
TraderName:=trim(gettextatex(colonx+8, colony, 0, upchars, false, true, 0, 2, 65535, 12, false, tr_AlphaNumericChars))
Wait(1500+Random(1500))
Accept;
Wait(15000+Random(RandomTime2))//change how long it takes to trade
Accept;
Wait(500+Random(600));
SendKeysSilent(message2 + (TraderName) + Chr(13));
Trades := Trades + 1
Progress;
End;
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
procedure findbankcolor;
var
mx, my, BankSymColor: integer;
Begin
if(BankSymbolColor>6021102)then
Begin
Writeln('Bank Symbol Color: ’ + inttostr(BankSymbolColor))
exit;
end else if(BankSymbolColor=6021102)then
begin
If(findsymbol(mx,my,‘bank’))Then
Begin
BankSymColor:=Getcolor(mx, my)
Writeln('Bank Symbol Color: ’ + inttostr(BankSymColor))
End Else
If(not(findsymbol(mx,my,‘bank’)))Then
Begin
Writeln(‘Cant locate bank symbol’)
Writeln(‘Make sure you are at bank’)
Logout;
Terminatescript;
End;
end;
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
Procedure bank_da_item;

Begin
MarkTime(Mark);
LoadDTM;
Wait(500+random(1000))
Repeat
If FindDTM(Booth1dtm, x, y, MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2) Or
FindDTM(Booth2dtm, x, y, MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2) Then
Mmouse(x,y,3,3);
Until(IsUpTextMulti(‘nk boo’,‘Ban’,‘se Ban’))or
(TimeFromMark(Mark) >= 500000) And Not (IsUpTextMulti(‘nk boo’,‘Ban’,‘se Ban’))
If(TimeFromMark(Mark) >= 500000) And
Not(IsUpTextMulti(‘nk boo’,‘Ban’,‘se Ban’))Then
Begin
FreeDTM(Booth1dtm)
FreeDTM(Booth2dtm)
WriteLn(‘Cant find the bank, this is going to log out!’);
Logout;
Terminatescript;
End Else
If (IsUpTextMulti(‘nk boo’,‘Ban’,‘se Ban’)) Then
Begin
Mouse(x,y,2,2,False);
Wait(59+Random(50))
ChooseOption(x, y, ‘Use-quickly’);
Wait(3000+random(1000)) // must be at comp
Flag;
Wait(2000+Random(2000));
FreeDTM(Booth1dtm);
FreeDTM(Booth2dtm);
If Not(Bankscreen)Then
Begin
FindNormalRandoms;
End Else
If(Bankscreen)Then
Begin
Closebank;
Findnormalrandoms;
End;
End;
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
begin
SetUpSRL;
ActivateClient;
ClearDebug;
SetChats;
Writeln(’<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>’);
Writeln(‘YoU aRe NoW UsInG JuNkYj"S sCrIpT’);
Writeln(‘ReMeMbEr To ReAd ThE StUfF aT tHe ToP’);
Writeln(‘If CoPiEd CrEdIt GoEs To JuNkJ!’);
Writeln(‘ThAnK yOu FoR UsInG jUnKj"s AuToTaLkEr!’);
Writeln(‘PrEsS CtRl+AlT+s To StOp’);
Writeln(’<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>’);
repeat
bank da item;
findbankcolor;
autotalk;
Trading;
until(Trades = HowMuchToTrade)
If(Trades = HowMuchToTrade)Then
Begin
Writeln(‘JuNkYj"S scipt has been succesfully finished!’);
Progress;
Logout;
TerminateScript;
End;
end.
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//--------------------------END-OF-SCRIPT-------------------------------------\[/code]
I fixed all the compiling errors up to LoadDTM. You don’t have any DTM’s in your script, so how can you load a DTM? Also, you don’t have any parameters telling it which DTM to load… Good job on the script though eh, if you need any more help, ask.

Read full topic
item.source: *MAYBE* hard to fix-FindBankSymbol color and put the object in bank

item.title: *MAYBE* hard to fix-FindBankSymbol color and put the object in bank
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

I need help on my autotalker+tader+banker (My bro doesnt kno how to do this :eek:)

I need to fix the bank finder…
And the banker procedure

This is my script
[scar]{ ~~~~~~~ ~~~~~ ~~~~~ ~~ ~~~ ~~~
_________~_~~~~~~~~~____~
J //jjjjjjj| ||uuuu| J ||uuuu| J||n| ||kk| //kk/
//| ||uuuu| J||uuuu| ||n| J ||kk| //kk/
||j| J||uuuu| ||uuuu| ||n|____ ||kk| J//kk/
J J ||j| ||uuuu| J ||uuuu| ||n| \\ J ||kk|//kk/ J
___ ||j| ||uuuu| ||uuuu| ||n| J ||n| ||kk|kkk|
||jjj| J ||j| ||uuuu| ||uuuu| ||n| ||n| ||kk| \kk
||jjj| ||j| ||uuuu| J ||uuuu| J||n| J ||n| J ||kk| J\kk\ J
||jjj|___||j| ||uuuu| ||uuuu| ||n| ||n| ||kk| \kk
||| J \|//// J ||| ||_| |||J \\

jjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjjj
jjjjjjjjjjj
*******jjjjjjj
**********************jjjjjjjjjjjjjjjj******************************
jjjjjjjjjjjj************
jjjjjjj j*************
jjjjjj************************
jjjj************************
j***************j*********
j***************j*********
j***************j*********
j***************j*********
j*****j*********
jjjjjjjjjjjjjjj

{<^%$@$%$@%$@^#%&^%&%-!=$JUNKY PRODUCTIONS$=-!#^$&%&^$!#@$$&%^&$%$#@$#%@>}
{!READ AT OWN RISK!}
{ !NOT! !RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY BANNED ACOUNT!( OR SCAMMED ACOUNT} }
{ LAST VERSION OF AUTOTALKER }
{ !REPORT ANY BUGS OR STUFF THAT DOESNT WORK! }
{!where ever it says “ONLY CHANGE THIS” read or change what its talking about! }
{ must be at the computer when trading and banking }
{ SETUP the SETUP }
{ !!!IF COPIED,SOME OF THE CREDIT GOES TO ME, DO NOT SAY ALL TO YOU!GOSH!!! }
{ ±+SPECIAL THANKS TO±+ }
{ BULLZEYE }
{ JUNIOR }
{ AND OTHERS THAT HELPED }
{ ENJOY THE JUNKY SCRIPT IS FULLY UPDATED,LOOK BELOW FOR MORE UPDATES! }
//////////////////////////////////|||:|||\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
{VERSION 1.0—ask for it nicely (Average autotalker)
{VERSION 1.1— ask for it nicley!{trades,accepts, and logs out!!!}
{VERSION 1.2— adjustments{Goes to the bank,puts the money in and logs out!!}
{PLEASE REMEMBER BANNED ACOUNTS ARE NOT MY PROBLEM!}
{________________________________ENJOY!}
{SET UP CONST AND READ NOTES!}
{__________________________________________________}
program autotalker;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/misc/trade.scar}

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
//---------------------------------setup--------------------------------------\
const //
message1=(‘buying air runes!’); //type what you want him/her to say.} \
RandomTime=1000;//Change to set random time,EX=(1000-infinite=sec,1-999=Msec) \ //
HowMuchToTrade=1; //how many declines from the trade before it logs out \
BankSymbolColor=6021102; //put your bank symbol color here //
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
message2=(‘Thanks’); // DO NOT CHANGE THIS!!!
RandomTime2=5000;

procedure autotalk;
begin
wait(4000+random(RandomTime)) // change random time above
TypeSend(Message1 + Chr(13))
end;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
Procedure SetChats;
Begin
SetChat(‘Hide’, 1);
SetChat(‘off’, 2);
SetChat(‘on’, 3);
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
Procedure Progress;
Begin
Writeln(‘Running for ‘+(TimeRunning)+’’);
Writeln(‘Went Through ‘+(IntToStr(Trades))+’ trades!’);
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
Procedure Trading;
Var
TraderName: string;
colonx, colony :integer;
Begin
AcceptTrade;
Wait(2000+Random(2000))
If Not(TradeScreen)Then
Begin
Exit;
End Else
If(TradeScreen)Then
Begin
TraderName:=trim(gettextatex(colonx+8, colony, 0, upchars, false, true, 0, 2, 65535, 12, false, tr_AlphaNumericChars))
Wait(1500+Random(1500))
Accept;
Wait(15000+Random(RandomTime2))//change how long it takes to trade
Accept;
Wait(500+Random(600));
SendKeysSilent(message2 + (TraderName) + Chr(13));
Trades := Trades + 1
Progress;
End;
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
procedure findbankcolor;
var
mx, my: integer;
Begin
if(BankSymbolColor>6021102)then
Begin
Writeln('Bank Symbol Color: ’ + inttostr(BankSymbolColor))
exit;
end else
if(BankSymbolColor=6021102)then
If(findsymbol(mx,my,‘bank’))Then
Begin
BankSymbolColor:= Getcolor (mx, my: integer;)
Writeln('Bank Symbol Color: ’ + inttostr(BankSymbolColor))
End Else
If(not(findsymbol(mx,my,‘bank’)))Then
Begin
Writeln(‘Cant locate bank symbol’)
Writeln(‘Make sure you are at bank’)
Logout;
Terminatescript;
End;
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
Procedure bank da item;

Begin
MarkTime(Mark);
LoadDTM;
Wait(500+random(1000))
Repeat
If FindDTM(Booth1dtm, x, y, MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2) Or
FindDTM(Booth2dtm, x, y, MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2) Then
Mmouse(x,y,3,3);
Until(IsUpTextMulti(‘nk boo’,‘Ban’,‘se Ban’))or
(TimeFromMark(Mark) >= 500000) And Not (IsUpTextMulti(‘nk boo’,‘Ban’,‘se Ban’))
If(TimeFromMark(Mark) >= 500000) And
Not(IsUpTextMulti(‘nk boo’,‘Ban’,‘se Ban’))Then
Begin
FreeDTM(Booth1dtm)
FreeDTM(Booth2dtm)
WriteLn(‘Cant find the bank, this is going to log out!’);
Logout;
Terminatescript;
End Else
If (IsUpTextMulti(‘nk boo’,‘Ban’,‘se Ban’)) Then
Begin
Mouse(x,y,2,2,False);
Wait(59+Random(50))
ChooseOption(x, y, ‘Use-quickly’);
Wait(3000+random(1000)) // must be at comp
Flag;
Wait(2000+Random(2000));
FreeDTM(Booth1dtm);
FreeDTM(Booth2dtm);
If Not(Bankscreen)Then
Begin
FindNormalRandoms;
End Else
If(Bankscreen)Then
Begin
Closebank;
Findnormalrandoms;
End;
End;
End;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
begin
SetUpSRL;
ActivateClient;
ClearDebug;
SetChats;
Writeln(’<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>’);
Writeln(‘YoU aRe NoW UsInG JuNkYj"S sCrIpT’);
Writeln(‘ReMeMbEr To ReAd ThE StUfF aT tHe ToP’);
Writeln(‘If CoPiEd CrEdIt GoEs To JuNkJ!’);
Writeln(‘ThAnK yOu FoR UsInG jUnKj"s AuToTaLkEr!’);
Writeln(‘PrEsS CtRl+AlT+s To StOp’);
Writeln(’<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>’);
repeat
bank da item;
findbankcolor;
autotalk;
Trading;
until(Trades = HowMuchToTrade)
If(Trades = HowMuchToTrade)Then
Begin
Writeln(‘JuNkYj"S scipt has been succesfully finished!’);
Progress;
Logout;
TerminateScript;
End;
end.
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------\
//--------------------------END-OF-SCRIPT-------------------------------------\
[/scar]

Help anyone?
Please?
